```{r}
library(tibble)
library(kableExtra)

```

```{r}
my_table <- tibble(
  categoryA = c(1,2,3,4),
  categoryB = c("one","two","three","four"),
  other = c(14.3,182.5,54,33.1)
)

my_table %>%
  kable(caption = "My Table", booktabs = TRUE,
        col.names = c("A", "B", "Other")) %>%
  pack_rows("Run 1", 1,2) %>%
  pack_rows("Run 2", 3,4) %>%
  add_header_above(c("Categories" = 2, " " = 1)) %>%
  kable_styling
```
